name: Adaptative thresholding for fMRI
short_description:
Matlab plug-in for SPM allowing to obtain a threshold for cluster FDR - the method fits a Gamma-Gaussian mixture model to the SPM-T and finds the optimal threshold (crossing between noise and activation). 
Optionally write the thresholded maps.
summary: Matlab scripts to perform cluster FDR adaptative thresholding
